content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on arapahoe rd, both times, heading east towards parker rd, taking pics of clouds with my phone, not looking, just clicking, then reviewing later. the clear day was in '15, the other cloudy day 5 months earlier.
the clear shot has at least 2 , the big one in the center, and one visable at 8 o'clock by the pole, with maybe more in the clouds.
mid afternoon, 2:00 pm ish, on both pics. the cloudy one has a detail, the clear needs none.
content.summary: A clear view of a disc(s) flying by

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from lunch i caught a movement out of the corner of my eye just above tree level. i saw a vehicle in the air. it had a saucer top, a recessed cone bottom (which was towards the ground) and a light that appeared silver in the junction between top and bottom. i initially thought it was a kite. i observed it hover for a few moments, then rapidly go straight up. there was a cloud behind it. i watched it go up infront of the cloud, then above it until it disappeared far up in the sky. the ascent was faster than any aircraft i have ever seen. i have seen a lot of aircraft having worked as enlisted aircrew in the military.
content.summary: Ufo with domed top and recessed tear drop bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving due south at dusk when i saw a bright round pink object in the sky ahead of me, my journey was approx 35 mins and the object remained ahead of me about the size of the moon, when i arrived at my destination the object was almost above me, it must have been large as i could see clearly that it was turning slowly and it had lights around the rim and a dome, it made no noise, i was too stunned and excited to think of taking a picture.   i thought it could be an alien craft as i had seen a v formation in italy once as a child so i knew they existed...I called a witness to the event and they watched it with me for 5 mins or so and then the craft seemed to slowly move a little to the right and then go upwards until it disappeared completely.    

i immediately phoned air traffic control at nearby northolt military airport who denied anything untoward on their radar...I also called the police who said they had not had any reports and dismissed my call as a weather balloon or perhaps a virgin airship..I called virgin the next day and they said they had no air balloons in the shape of flying saucers and they do not fly at night...Plus they are never static..   i wrote to my local paper who put me in touch with a ufo expert who's editor of a ufo magazine.  i called him, he asked for a description and for me to draw a picture of the craft which i did.  he told me that it was most probably an alien craft as it fitted the description of other reported sightings previously...My experience did leave me with a curiousity to know more as to this day i cannot believe what i saw and people always look at me as if i'm crazy so i don't talk about it...But i know what i saw and i can't explain it...All the photos i see of ufos are so fuzzy and far away whereas this was so bright, close and clear, just wish i had not been so enthralled and had taken a picture with my phone but i was transfixed and didn't dare move..
content.summary: Large bright pink object remained ahead of car when i arrived at destination object above me stayed there for c. 10 mins then took off upwards fast and disappeared within seconds, witnessed by others

content.detailedDescription:
Witness called me 02-28-16:
on 02-24-16 at 8:30pm the witness saw 2 triangle shaped craft hovering at approx. 30 degrees in the eastern sky.  one of the craft made a sharp turn and left briefly, only to return to the same area almost head on colliding with the remaining craft before it stopped to hover beside it again.  the craft appeared larger than a commercial airliner, were dark, and had rows of lights on the underside.  there were 2 rows of red, a few white, but mostly green lights which numbered at about 20 on the underside of each craft.  there was no sound, no animal reaction, the sky was clear and there were no other aircraft in the area.  the witness lost sight after 30 minutes because she grew tired of watching and went into the house.
debbie ziegelmeyer
mufon star team
content.summary: 2 triangle craft hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Location: -37.859505, 144.968862

noticed object as it reflected light, and was stationary for some time

no idea what object was, was able to see with naked eye, then took photos of the object to view via camera.

object looks like a set of wings, stayed in the same location, and then disappeared 

no feelings, only reaction was of curiosity

lost site of object as it disappeared
content.summary: Hovering object viewed for 5mins, 20mins after sunset, and then disappeared

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving east down a country road about 9 pm on february 27, 2016. my husband was talking to me and i was looking out the window. i always look at the stars at night. i noticed one of the stars lower in the sky did not look like all the others. it was slightly bigger and slightly brighter. it also had a golden tint instead of the whitish color most stars have. it was stationary and i thought maybe it was a planet and that's why it looked different. i did notice a plane flying past what looked like the same area of the star.I kept looking at it almost constantly for about 5 mins. suddenly the "star" began to move in a nw direction. it seemed to have the same speed from the moment it began moving until i lost sight of it when the angle was over my car. at that time i felt kind of fearful and started thinking of scenarios of what might happen next. which thankfully was nothing! i told my husband about it as soon as it had began moving but from his angle he could not see it. we had a similar experience about 5 years ago a out 15 miles south of the same area. we were in the backyard late at night having a fire. two stationary "stars" did not look right to me. they were the same color as the other stars just brighter and bigger than the other around them and just seemed out if place. my husband and i were discussing them seeming different and possibly being ufo's. they were there, from the time we noticed, for about 15 mins. when suddenly they began to move in a ne direction at the same exact time and keeping the same exact distance, direction, and speed. for about 1 min when the lights just went out. i don't know if it was one object or two. just moments later there were several planes in the area of where the lights disappeared coming from different directions. i felt kinda shocked at what i has seen. my husband and i still talk about it sometimes.
content.summary: Looked like a gold star stationary for about 4 or 5 mins then took off in a nw direction and could no longer see.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside of my home and looked in the sky on the right front of me in the sky. i stared for a while at the stationary skeleted object and was amazed what i saw. i saw the sky between the skelet. i never really talked about it because of being accused to be crazy. i looked at it about approximately 5-10 minutes. i went away and when i came back it was away.
content.summary: Trapezium skelet in silver color

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car, looking at a helicopter flying nearby in the evening sky. i could see planes on approach for landing at lax. i also saw a steady glowing light about 1,000 feet ahead of me in the sky. as i arrived at home, i turned off my car, got out and turned around to see if the light was still there in the sky, it was. i walked to the end of my driveway, looking at the object the whole time. about five to seven seconds later, the light blinked off, but i could still see the object due to all the light pollution in the sky. it was a dull spheroid shape that made no motion. i then walked further out into the street to observe this stealthy object and as i did so, the object began to move towards me, lowering it's altitude. it was directly overhead, about 200 ft or so above the ground and i could see strange detail.
the object was not spheroid as i first thought, but was more of a soft cube-like shape, white or light grey, with large diameter holes or circles on all faces.The circles appeared about five feet in diameter.
the object floated like a soap bubble, smooth and quiet, graceful and on a direct path. as i kept looking up at it, it appeared to twist or rotate/counter-rotate at both ends slowly, with one hole or circle facing directly down at me. no glow, it descended and came lower and lower until it seemed to land behind the roof of my neighbors house. there is a cul-de-sac their house, so i climbed in my car and drove to where i thought it might be. when i reached the location, there was no sign of anything at all.
the next day i related the story to the gentleman of the house and he told me he owns no drone or model aircraft or balloon. whatever it was made no noise but moved across the sky with purpose and landed in a very dark area at night. the only other time i witnessed anything like this was during fourth of july of 2015. i have video and still images of that evening of what appear to be the same objects.
i submit those images and video now in support of this description. i thought they were drones at first, but now, seeing it up close, i can no longer assume that due to the strange movement and appearance without light.
content.summary: Orange orb glowed,then light off but could still see shape, then moved overhead and landed behind house, large, no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen them previously two years earlier in a different location and asked on facebook if anyone had seen them. two years later my husband and i were sat watching tv when he pointed the orange light moving in the sky it was followed by two others after approx. a min apart. he is a non believer but was unable to explain  this. they couldn't be lanterns as there were three following a direct line and could hear a hum.
content.summary: Three glowing spheres in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog.  the sky looked strange.  so i thought it would be cool to get some pictures.
content.summary: I didn't even see it when i was taking the pictures.  but obviously it was able to be seen with my camera phone.  i noticed them at dinner while looking at them.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 10 freeway in alhambra when i noticed a metallic object which was hovering over some hills , my initial reaction was that it was a metallic balloon so i asked my daughter and her friend to give me their  opinion. they assured me that it was not a balloon, i pulled over on the freeway and got a better look as it was moving slowly an realized it was a v shaped metallic object about the size of a small plane . it was moving like a falling leaf in all kinds of directions but not falling , it was hovering and changing directions , it also flew lower and higher in elevation but never went too low . once in a while it would flicker it's lights which at one point i was able to see one on each corner of the object . the most interesting part was when it elevated higher , a big jet with trails passed really close to it and as it did , the object started lighting up for a few seconds then it stopped .  i told my daughter , " wow, i know for a fact that pilot must have  took a good look at that object . i say pilot only because it was not a passenger airplane , i live in chino and ontario airport is a few miles away , i see passages airplanes on a daily basis . we looked at this object for about 25 minutes before it went up so high that we lost track of it . i tried to video tape it with my iphone but was not too happy with my shots, but you can still make out the object and the way it was moving and flashing it's lights . one thing i thought to myself , if it is some sort of a flying object , how can someone be inside of it due to the way it moved rotating in all kinds of ways being a v shaped object you would expect it to move in one direction , straight .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A v shaped metallic object with a light on each corner that rotated in many ways as if it was falling but it was hovering . it would light up occasionally over the 10 freeway in alhambra ca

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog around 11pm at night when i  lookedup and saw this light desending on to  the ranch, we only have 3 acres, but it landed in a small pasture, it was about 70 ft in diameter,i went  okay fine,,  im not afraid of them, figure if they are gonna eat me or abduct me  there is nothing i can do.I stood there and  said cool,anyway a door opened and these 2  guys walked out said with hands outstretched  you have been wondering about us, for many years,, i  said well yes,then i looked up when they did and saw this huge and mean huge triangle that blocked out the sky, stars were gone, they said that is home for now,i said well your welcome to stay here,the conversation lasted about 2 hours, i learned a lot, more than  than ,i can type here,they did mention that this planet is in a bit of trouble, the greys or as they said the little ones, are  machines that come from a different galaxy system than they do, they  are from this galaxy, and have been watching this planet since the beginning of time,i felt safe around them,however after they left? there were 4 helicopters that flew over and few around this place for like 5 minutes, then left this isnt he 1st time ihave seen them  or the large triangle, my wife and my 89 year old dad also saw  the large traingle several months ago at  night,right above our ranch,
content.summary: Talked to them for over ahour,

content.detailedDescription:
So... i was sitting in my car on my way to pick up a friend, i had my ham radio on. in the other car seat, then something made me look in the sky, it was like my eyes noticed something so i checked.. the second i saw it i was sure it just was a meteor or something.. but at the same second i realized it wasn't moving, it was just there, then like 2 seconds after it flew straight up with a u turn towards the ground, when it was half way to ground it just disappeared in a milli sec.. and it was so big, the closest thing i can compare it with is one of those "road lights" dunno if that is what its called but the lights along the side of the road? :p with an orange light bulbe.. seen from 30 meters... but again not the same as normal light, you know when you look at light you can see these light beams out from the sides, this didn't happen when i saw this, and that was something i noticed as well.. and the ham radio i was talking about,, like 6-7 secs after it went away, my radio made this sound "bew!!" fast and really loud, it was like something flew over my car and almost hit my antenna or something. i got radio license and use radios alot, and i have never heard any radio make that sound.. 

the attached picture is from google maps, exacly where i was, and the same way i was driving, and i drew the object i saw, in the sice i belive i saw it as well.
on the picture is day, and some skyes, but that night it was a clear sky.
i remember the time really well, because i took out my phone dialing the police number.. but then i just didnt call them, googled ufo reporting instead and found you. calling the police telling you just saw something that could be an ufo i dunno... does it happen ofthen`? its not like the police can do anything for you anyways...

what i saw that night, is unique to anything i have seen my whole life, 
now every time im outside i always look up, in a hope of seeing this again.
content.summary: It stood still for 2 secounds, then somehow went straight up with a u turn back down but then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: 7:40 pm 2/28/16 saw total of 8 orange balls rising from tree line. sometimes one at a time and sometimes two at a time. each one rose to a point in the sky stopped and hovered for aprox 10 seconds then moved off slowly then accelerated rapidly.Each one after hover left view in roughly 1.5 seconds. took pictures with my nikon d 70s with 300 mm f 4 lens. took 11 pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Total of 8 orange balls rising from tree line

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my puppy, looked up seen trangular shape w/ 7 lights. i noticed only the lights first.  then it flew into lighter clouds i seen the out line. it was not a completely clear night, the stars were patchy, the ufo was in/above clouds but i always could see lights- dim-bright pending on cloud cover. only once i seen the dark outline.
it was one ship because the lights appeared fixed. they never changed position. it was flying from north to south-south east, it appeared to move laterally once for a short jog to the east but maintained its north to south east line of travel.
i watched it from directly above me till it was no longer visible- due to its distance and cloud cover.

hope this helps,,,
bob r
content.summary: Looked up seen trangular shape w/ 7 lights

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the back porch to look for my dog. i saw a ship oorsomethimg of that sorts in the sky over the trees. i called my sister and she came out and saw room we looked at it for about 30 seconds and then it just vanished.
content.summary: Walked on back porch looking for my dog and looked up above the tree and there it was. i told my sister to come look and she did. it just hover about 300 ft over in the distance over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: On 9/27 & 28, 2015, my husband sat outside to watch the changes to the moon, until quite late. i took several pictures with my iphone, marveling at the beauty of the red, blood moon. we went in about midnight because it got very cloudy. about 2 a.M. i woke abruptly (not unusual, i'm not a very sound sleeper) and decided to see what the moon looked like then/if the clouds disapated. when i saw there was a break in the clouds, at least around the moon, i took several more photos. clouds quickly moved back in so went back inside and looked at the pictures. i was amazed to see a small orb circling the moon, clearly apparent in the photos. i immediately went back outside to try to take more photos, but the clouds moved in and completely covered the moon by then. i woke my husband to show him the photos. he told me then i should contact you. i waited only because i didn't want to waste your time with my poor quality photos, but then decided, you should be the ones to decide their value.
content.summary: Orb shown circling the moon on night of 9/15 "blood moon"

content.detailedDescription: I often take videos just to look at later to slow down and that's how i caught the orbs ,the main ones are at the top of the screen and the are also a couple of little ones at the bottem of the screen also two clear orbs go through the middle of the screen it all happens in a matter of seconds and would probly not been seen with the naked eye ,i was in shoebury park in shoeburyness essex in england ,where most of my videos are taken i have many more that change direction but have not got the right equipment to get from my saved icloud at this time .
content.summary: Was just doing random videos of sky did not see with naked eye unlike slowed down

content.detailedDescription:
I went over to my dad house to say good night and as i left the house to come back to mine i looked over to the sky and was just remembering about how i used to look at the stars in england and think i wish i was home and i noticed a really bright redish star, it was moving really fast and as i focused on it i saw that there was multiple stars moving the same speed and direction, there was a red big bright one, and several white smaller ones that were less visible and sometimes it would look like they desappeared and another would shine. there was also a moment where it looked like the stars shaped into a y. it looked like a constelation moving. i got really curious and kept looking at it, thinking what could it be, it was moving towards me, and i couldnt think about an explanation for what i was seeing, satelites dont move together like that, it was more than 10 stars (if it was stars) i'm still looking for a rational explanation.. one that can be justified without making me sound crazy, anyways i started getting really nervous as it was moving towards me, when it was getting really close to me it slowed down what made me really scared and nervous so i just ran inside the house. i kinda felt like it knew i was staring at it. it was around 20:00 (1:30h ago) and it lasted around 5-10 minutes, i told my boyfriend and my uncle but they didnt really took me serious, or they just didnt care too much about it, i went outside again after talking to them and there was no more moving constelation. i might just be losing my mind but i'm sure i'm not seeing things that aren't there.
i just wanna know if there is any logical scientific explanation to this, or if anyone as seen the same because i hate not knowing things, unknowing things scares me and i wanna have an explanation so i wont be scared, and a matter of fact i've studied a lot and researched a lot about astronomy (i mean about the universe and not really ufo's) i believe we are not alone but i kinda believe that if there's life out there would be bacterial or something alike, not inteligent life and it doesn't fit in any of the possibilities i would normally think of if someone would tell me they seen what i've seen.
content.summary: Constelation moving fast throw the sky, that slowed down above me.

content.detailedDescription:
It's worth noting that on the day of our encounter, an airshow in nearby point magu had been called of by the military due to adverse weather conditions that had grounded their aircraft.  my family and i were sitting around our fire-pit around 9:00pm that evening, when my youngest brother (5 years old at the time) pointed behind us and said "what's that?".

we turned around and saw a large diamond shaped craft passing over the top of the hills behind our home, headed right for us at a steady speed that i would estimate was around 60-70 mph.  we all ran closer for a better look, while my mom ran inside the house to fetch binoculars.  we were all fascinated as we watched it glide effortlessly just above the tree line of our property, but once it was within 300 feet of us it suddenly stopped & hovered in place, and a feeling of terror slowly overcame us.  we were so close to the craft we could actually see a very bright white light through the row of windows, and what appeared to be a large room inside.  through the binoculars we could see markings similar to hieroglyphics just under the windows, however no occupants were visible from our vantage point.  

it hovered in place for 15-20 minutes before moving towards santa barbra and disappearing out of sight.  within minutes the airspace above our property became crowded with helicopters & aircraft at varying altitudes, and they circled over head for roughly 10 minutes before flying towards the navel base at point magu.  

a neighbor drove up to our home historical with fear, pulling her hair and asking us what we saw.  she told us she had seen the craft from the 101 freeway, and followed it all the way to our home.  

the next day my mom called the camarillo air traffic control to ask if their had been any aircraft in our area, but the tower assured her no aircraft had been observed on radar.  my dad was contacted over the phone by a strange man claiming to be a ufo researcher, and asked for an exhaustively detailed account of our the experience including our original drawings of the craft. when we never heard from him again, we began to suspect he may have been, in fact,  an official from the navel base instead.
content.summary: Ufo observed by hundreds of witnesses

content.detailedDescription: It was about 6.40 pm. my partner and l was sitting in our hot tub looking up at the sky suddenly l saw a green light moving very quickly it was the size of a large star accending and decending it flickered on then off then it appeared to defend out of my sight.Cant think what it could have been .I was so excited as l am a believer and so glad my partner was there to witness it.Just wanted to report my sighting as about 27 years ago l saw a ufo at first people laughed at me but the next night in our local news paper more people came forward with sightings ...L so wish l had followed it through.L do hope that other people saw this tonight. i lost sight of it due to other houses.Would be wonderful to get some feedback.Sorry l have no picture.
content.summary: Sat in hot tub looked up saw green light object moving very fast as sending and descending

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a stand still in morning rush hour traffic on i94, when i saw a
black rectangular ufo being escorted by a black helicopter heading east.
the ufo traveled in a gentle dolphin-like way, and it appeared to be 
shinny, possibly due to the sun.  it was 3 to 4 feet wide and 20 feet long.
it did not have any lights. i received a screen memory that the object was
a black pow flag that had been hanging at the state capitol building and
it had got free by accident. the helicopter was following it to retrieve it. many years later, when the memory was recalled, logic prevailed, and
there is no way a flag can travel down the middle of i94 for that distance
especially if it was followed by a helicopter.
content.summary: Black rectangular ufo closely followed by a black hekicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking, on the road, in between two corn fields, at about 9pm. there was no light around, excepted for the moon.

strangely, what made me notice the object was the photo i took of the moon. i stopped walking, took the picture, then saw a green dot on the said picture. took my head up, looked at it, went back to the picture, then back at looking and it had disappeared. so i didn't see it move per say, just appear and disappear.

i didn't think much of it. just before going for the walk, i had some people telling me it was not safe to walk alone in the dark, because of wild animals and people. i do take many of those walks, it helps me clear my mind... and yeah, i never feel alone while doing so. that night, like many others, i felt secure, kind of watched over, and i did asked if it was my imagination or not. i was drawn to look at the moon and take a picture. mind you, i don't normally have my cell phone with me. and rarely did i take pictures. when i saw the green light on the picture, on a second thought, i did felt funny, told myself yeah, i'm not alone. i felt as i so often do when i walk. out of time, out of sight, out of reality. that also happens in different situations. there, but not there. that night, i went back to the house. it was only then that i enlarged the picture... which just made me smile more. no fear, no questions, just a smile. and at peace, no thoughts.
content.summary: Observed in a field, one night, while i was walking, with only the moon's light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the public beach in delray ( north end). i was admiring the beautiful cloud formations when i noticed a very bright object, rectangle or oblong in the south east sky. it was too far for me to see the details. i first thought it was a reflection of the sun on a cloud but it didn't move when the clouds did. after about ten minutes, i didn't notice it there. then after about ten more minutes, i saw it again, more directly east, it was stationary and was about 30 degrees above the horizon. ( i am not good at knowing degrees, so i am guessing but you can observe it from my photos). there was a boat out in the ocean that looked as it may have been trying to go towards the object, i presume for curiosity sake. then a small plane and two helicopters flew around above us at the beach. 
the black helicopter was  hovering over the ocean then moved over the beach (going east to west , yet sideways????) most likely trying to photograph it from a distance???? not sure. very odd to hear the two copters and a small plane at the same time in the same area....

i decided to take photos with my iphone to document it, as it was not a usual sighting. maybe it was a weather balloon? it was just odd....So bright -enough to stand out. it did not scoot around...But did go from south east to east within the 45 minutes i observed it, and it had disappeared during the location transition.

the object was still there when i left. i am curious as to know what it may have been, any light you can shed would be appreciated.
content.summary: Observed a brigh, rectangle light over the atlantic ocean . se, stationary, disappeared, then was visible directly east , stayed there stationary for at least 40 minutes. photos were taken.

content.detailedDescription: I'm at my sister's house with some friends, when a few of us step outside to smoke. i immediately notice chemtrails in the sky and point them out. one minute later, a small plane appears over our heads, and i then noticed a flash of light appear just ahead of the small plane, and asked the person standing next to me if he had seen the flash. he said he did notice it. right after that, two very bright star-like objects appear in the sky looking ne. they were near each other. i have no idea how close they were to each other. i believe they were maybe a mile or two from us and they were just above the tree line at slightly different heights. they were bright and they appeared suddenly. it was like someone turned on two huge spotlights in the sky. i noticed right away, and so did everyone else. we all watched as the objects moved slowly closer together before dimming out completely and simultaneously. that lasted about two minutes. i became very anxious and agitated. i stayed outside for a few more minutes, while everyone else went back inside. small planes which were numerous before the sighting, were all gone. quiet sprayed sky and cold is all that remained. i had a feeling that the objects knew they were being observed. i had a very strange dream later which involved me lying on a table in a room with others present. a woman who looked like one of my teachers from elementary school, was standing over me. she smiled then she touched my forehead and stroked my face, causing me to giggle like a little kid. i felt like i was five years old again. she did it again. this time i laughed, but i felt older and a little aroused. when she attempted to touch me again, i grabbed her hand and yelled "get off me!" i pushed her away and fell off the table. i struggled with someone on the floor for maybe ten seconds and woke up in a sweat.
content.summary: Two very bright  star-like objects appear suddenly in the night sky. they slowly move closer together then dim out completely and simultaneously.

content.detailedDescription: This was the final night and annual closing ceremony for raquette lake boys & girls camp in the adirondack mountains. several hundred people were gathered around a large campfire in the center of a soccer field. the sky was perfectly clear and all lights were out surrounding the field. while the camp director was giving his speech, three fluorescent green round glowing orbs appeared rapidly coming from three different directions. there was no sound, and the objects appeared to be between 5000' - 10,000' directly overhead. they formed an equilateral triangle pattern, and began spinning in unison retaining the triangular shape. this lasted for approximately 5 - 10 minutes, then as quickly as they appeared they each shot off, in the blink of an eye, as quickly as they had originally appeared. there was never any sound. i have never seen any man made object move that quickly. they were literally gone in a second or two. everyone who had been listening to the director's speech had their attention on the sky. even the director himself stopped speaking because of the commotion among the crowd.
content.summary: Three green glowing round ufos appeared over a soccer field with hundreds of witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amateur astronomer and a bird watcher. i live near the valcartier military establishment. 

i often see things like huge white balls approximately 1 kilometer in diameter (and i am not kidding) suddenly changing direction. those dissappear in the direction of space. i also saw red balls 1 meter in diameter this time. they follow the river (up and down) where i live.

i had numerous observations throughout my life but i would like to report this one that happened to me last year (i did not know you had a web site until i contacted jean caseault, a ufologist, and saw your program on the history channel).

i was in the living room about to sit in order to catch up on my reading when i saw this one-eye thing watching me through the window facing the library. it my have had 2 eyes but i only saw one probably because of the window pane.

the eye was white, oval, no iris, plain white and approximately 3 inches long. the eye was about 3 feet above the deck. it seemed to be watching the inside of the library.

it could not be an animal because birds dont watch through windows neither do cats or hares.

when this eye saw me and when i saw it if left in a strake of light making a large somewhat take off sound.

weirdly it left where there was no exit, not in the direction of the stairway and the garage leading to the street but in the other direction where the deck stands at 15 feet above the ground.

what i saw was only a white rectangular patch, flying 3 feet above the deck. i did not see any détails for this thing was too rapid.

fortunately a light snow had fallen a few hours before and when i turned on the patio light there was no trace on neither the snow or the window pane.
content.summary: Oval white eye through window pane

content.detailedDescription: I was up late as i normally am when i have days off, i went for a smoke on my balcony around 1 am. as i smoke i usually look at the stars at night as i can see very clearly the orion's belt and more, but this time when i looked up i saw a "star" that is normally not there. i watched for a few seconds and noticed it moving in a unnatural pattern, up,down,side to side back and forth this bright "star" went, as i was trying to figure out what i was seeing it became brighter and almost seem to move closer to me. i ran downstairs to get my wife to make sure i was not the only one who was seeing this. she looked for a few seconds and said " i don't like this at all, i hope what ever is in there can't see us" and she went back inside and back to bed. i kept watching the object move, come closer then further away, it came in from the east then started heading north east, after about 30 minutes it seems just to fade out of this realm. i'm not 100% what i seen that night but i'am 100% sure it was not a terrestrial aircraft. i keep trying to see this object when i'm home but to this day i have had no suck luck.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Having smoke on belcony when i notice light not usually there at that time of night. light moved up down sideways back and forth, ran got wife to show her, she got scared and went back inside, i watch for 20-30 min then it headed ne and disappeared
